ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to enhance the reliability, transparency and efficiency with which language requirements are assessed during the processing of Federal Skilled Worker, Canadian Experience Class and Business Immigrant applications.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0054 Publication Date: 2011-03-16
